definition: to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: Such a judge is on the way toward political philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 如此的審斷者即是在朝向政治哲學之路上。

sentences.english: There is no real tradition for adjudicating consumer cases.
sentences.chinese: 日本沒有真正爲消費者的利益審斷案子的傳統。

sentences.english: If a man would weigh his own deeds fully and rightly, he would find little cause to pass severe judgment on others.
sentences.chinese: 一個人若公平地審斷自己，他判斷別人必不敢苛刻了。
